project.logic

Class ComputerSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.logic.ComputerSystem

  • public class ComputerSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes the computer system. Contains scheduling algorithms implementation based on the specified task graph.
    Author:
    Yaroslav

      • findArrayMax

        public static int findArrayMax(int[] array)
        Auxiliary method to find maximum value of the array. Uses simple "Bubble" algorithm.
        Parameters:
        array - array to sort
        Returns:
        sorted array

      • setNextIndex

        public void setNextIndex()
        This method searches for nextIndex value. It is useful when we delete existing nodes and then add new one.

      • checkConnectivity

        public boolean checkConnectivity()
        This method check whether computer system graph is fully connected or not.
        Returns:
        true if graph is connected

      • checkSystem

        public int checkSystem()
        This method checks computer system using both emptiness and connectivity checking
        Returns:
        true if both checks are true

                 int linksNumber,

        Main method to load task graph on the computer system.
        Parameters:
        graph - task graph
        algorythm - algorithm code
        linksNumber - number of the physical links
        duplex - duplex/simplex flag
